name: Death Fruit
description:
A lone traveler discovers a garden full of otherworldly beauty. Then she struggles to leave again...

Playtime approx. 10-15 min

If the game touches you in a way that you think it shouldn't, please seek help. 

TW: addiction, eating disorders

Credits:
